title: Romance Guide
content: tion to convince her to give you the soul coin. Tell Andrick and Brynna to forget the owlbear and leave. Crush the tadpole outside of the Druid Grove. Swear to Nettie you will take the wyvern poison. Convince the owlbear not to kill you in its cave. Tell Scratch (the dog) that he can come to your Camp if his friend doesn't wake up. Resist during the first dream sequence. Fight the fake god Boooal in the Festering Cove. Decline the devil's invitation to remove your tadpole. Make Novice Crusher ki
